text: Majitha Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 13) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Amritsar district, Punjab state, India. VVPAT will be used in Majitha in the 2017 Assembly polls. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 2017: Bikram Singh Majithia, Shiromani Akali Dal ==Election results== ===2017=== ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Amritsar district
title: Majitha Assembly Constituency
